00034 SignalBackgroundCelListener::SignalBackgroundCelListener(std::vector<ProbeListPacked>& probeSets,
00035                                                          QCProbesetOptions& psOpts,
00036                                                          ChipLayout* layout,
00037                                                          std::string label) :
00038   m_ProbeSets(probeSets),
00039   m_psOpts(psOpts),
00040   m_layout(layout),
00041   m_Label(label)
00042 {
00043   Verbose::out(2, "Initializing Multichannel SignalBackgroundCelListener Okay!");
00044 
00045   //
00046   declareMetric(m_Label+"_AT_B_IQR",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00047   declareMetric(m_Label+"_AT_B",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00048   declareMetric(m_Label+"_AT_FLD",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00049   declareMetric(m_Label+"_AT_SBR",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00050   declareMetric(m_Label+"_AT_S_IQR",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00051   declareMetric(m_Label+"_AT_S",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00052   declareMetric(m_Label+"_A_signal_mean",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00053   //declareMetric(m_Label+"_AsignalToTsignal",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00054   declareMetric(m_Label+"_C_signal_mean",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00055   declareMetric(m_Label+"_GC_B_IQR",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00056   declareMetric(m_Label+"_GC_B",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00057   declareMetric(m_Label+"_GC_FLD",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00058   declareMetric(m_Label+"_GC_SBR",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00059   declareMetric(m_Label+"_GC_S_IQR",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00060   declareMetric(m_Label+"_GC_S",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00061   declareMetric(m_Label+"_G_signal_mean",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00062   //declareMetric(m_Label+"_GsignalToCsignal",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00063   declareMetric(m_Label+"_T_signal_mean",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00064 }

00066 /**
00067  * Add a new probe subset via a mask associated with identifier name.
00068  *
00069  * @param name - string identifier associated with this mask (i.e. "all", "pm")
00070  * @param mask - bit mask with probes to calculate stats for set to true.
00071  */
00072 void SignalBackgroundCelListener::addProbeMask(const std::string &name,
00073                                                const std::vector<bool> &mask) {
00074   m_MaskNames.push_back(name);
00075   m_ProbeMasks.push_back(mask);
00076 }
00077 
00078 /**
00079  * Loop though an open cel file and fill in the statistics for each
00080  * probe subset.
00081  *
00082  * @param masks - Different probe subsets to calculate stats for.
00083  * @param cel - Cel file to get data from.
00084  * @param chipStats - Vector to fill in with stats for each mask.
00085  */
00086 void
00087 SignalBackgroundCelListener::calcStats(const std::vector<std::vector<bool> > &masks,
00088                                        affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData* cel,
00089                                        std::vector<CumulativeStats<double> > &chipStats)
00090 {
00091   assert(chipStats.size() == masks.size());
00092   /*Turn on full method where medians and IQR could be computed */
00093   for (int sIx = 0; sIx < chipStats.size(); sIx++){
00094     chipStats[sIx].setFull();
00095   }
00096 
00097   int numCels = cel->GetNumCells();
00098   if (numCels == 0) {
00099     Err::errAbort("SignalBackgroundCelListener::calcStats -- No data found in one of the channels for CEL file: " + ToStr(cel->GetFileName()));
00100   }
00101 
00102   /* Get each entry in a cel file and then add it to different masks
00103      as appropriate. */
00104 
00105   for(int celIx = 0; celIx < numCels; celIx++) {
00106     std::vector<std::vector<bool> >::const_iterator maskIx;
00107     std::vector<CumulativeStats<double> >::iterator statIx;
00108     float intensity = cel->GetIntensity(celIx);
00109     /* Check all the masks to see if they include this data point. */
00110     for(maskIx = masks.begin(), statIx = chipStats.begin();
00111         maskIx != masks.end() && statIx != chipStats.end();
00112         maskIx++, statIx++) {
00113       if(*(maskIx->begin() + celIx) == true) {
00114         statIx->addData(intensity);
00115       }
00116     }
00117   }
00118 
00119   // calculate full method metrics like medians and IQR
00120   for (int sIx = 0; sIx < chipStats.size(); sIx++) {
00121     chipStats[sIx].setUpFullMethod();
00122   }
00123 
00124 }

00146 void SignalBackgroundCelListener::newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData* cel)
00147 {
00148   double A_signal=0.0;
00149   double T_signal=0.0;
00150   double G_signal=0.0;
00151   double C_signal=0.0;
00152 
00153   const int channel_cnt=2;
00154 
00155   std::vector<double> signal; //signs[channel]
00156   std::vector<double> signal_median; //signal_median[channel]
00157   std::vector<double> signal_IQR; //signal_IQR[channel] inter-quartile range
00158   signal.resize(channel_cnt);
00159   signal_median.resize(channel_cnt);
00160   signal_IQR.resize(channel_cnt);
00161 
00162   std::vector<double> bg;   //bg[channel]
00163   std::vector<double> bg_median; //bg_median[channel]
00164   std::vector<double> bg_IQR; //bg_IQR[channel]
00165   bg.resize(channel_cnt);
00166   bg_median.resize(channel_cnt);
00167   bg_IQR.resize(channel_cnt);
00168 
00169   std::vector<double> signalbackground; //signalbackground[channel]
00170   std::vector<double> signalbackgroundFLD; //T score type of metric take two medians and avg of IQR
00171   signalbackground.resize(channel_cnt); //resize to fit two channels
00172   signalbackgroundFLD.resize(channel_cnt); //resize to fit two channels
00173 
00174   Verbose::out(4, "calculating signal-background statistics for "+ ToStr(cel->GetFileName()));
00175 
00176         std::vector<std::wstring> channel_names = cel->GetChannels();
00177 
00178   for (int channel = 0; channel< channel_cnt; channel++){
00179     // @todo how do we know it has two?
00180     cel->SetActiveDataGroup(channel_names[channel]);
00181 
00182     std::vector<std::vector<bool> >::iterator maskIx;
00183     std::vector<CumulativeStats<double> > chipStats(m_ProbeMasks.size());
00184 
00185     calcStats(m_ProbeMasks, cel, chipStats);
00186 
00187 #define PRINTIT(_x) { printf("   %-30s %10.6f\n",#_x,_x); }
00188 
00189 //    for (int j=0;j<m_ProbeMasks.size();j++) {
00190 //      printf("JHG: channel: %2d j: %2d --------------------\n",channel,j);
00191 //      PRINTIT(chipStats[j].getMean());
00192 //      PRINTIT(chipStats[j].getMedian());
00193 //      PRINTIT(chipStats[j].getIQR());
00194 //    }
00195 
00196     // GC channel
00197     if (channel == 0) {
00198       for(int j=0; j<m_ProbeMasks.size(); j++){
00199         if (m_MaskNames[j].compare("GC") == 0){
00200           //chipStats[j].setUpFullMethod();
00201           //Verbose::out(4, "GC median is " + ToStr(chipStats[j].getMedian()));
00202           //Verbose::out(4, "GC IQR is " + ToStr(chipStats[j].getIQR()));
00203           signal[channel] = chipStats[j].getMean();
00204           signal_median[channel] = chipStats[j].getMedian();
00205           signal_IQR[channel] = chipStats[j].getIQR();
00206         }
00207         else if (m_MaskNames[j].compare("AT") == 0){
00208           bg[channel] = chipStats[j].getMean();
00209           bg_median[channel] = chipStats[j].getMedian();
00210           bg_IQR[channel] = chipStats[j].getIQR();
00211         }
00212         else if (m_MaskNames[j].compare("G") == 0){ //getting A signal in AT channel
00213           G_signal = chipStats[j].getMean();
00214         }
00215         else if (m_MaskNames[j].compare("C") == 0){ //getting T signal in AT channel
00216           C_signal = chipStats[j].getMean();
00217         }
00218         else{
00219           // A and T signal are the backgrounds
00220           // we can pull them off if we need it
00221         }
00222       }
00223     }
00224     // AT channel
00225     else if (channel == 1) {
00226       for(int j=0; j<m_ProbeMasks.size(); j++){
00227         if (m_MaskNames[j].compare("AT") == 0){
00228           signal[channel] = chipStats[j].getMean();
00229           signal_median[channel] = chipStats[j].getMedian();
00230           signal_IQR[channel] = chipStats[j].getIQR();
00231         }
00232         else if (m_MaskNames[j].compare("GC") == 0){
00233           bg[channel] = chipStats[j].getMean();
00234           bg_median[channel] = chipStats[j].getMedian();
00235           bg_IQR[channel] = chipStats[j].getIQR();
00236         }
00237         else if (m_MaskNames[j].compare("A") == 0){ //getting A signal in AT channel
00238           A_signal = chipStats[j].getMean();
00239         }
00240         else if (m_MaskNames[j].compare("T") == 0){ //getting T signal in AT channel
00241           T_signal = chipStats[j].getMean();
00242         }
00243         else{
00244           // G and C signals are the background in this channel
00245           // we can pull them off if need it
00246         }
00247       }
00248     }
00249 
00250 //    PRINTIT(signal[channel]);
00251 //    PRINTIT(signal_median[channel]);
00252 //    PRINTIT(signal_IQR[channel]);
00253 //    PRINTIT(bg[channel]);
00254 //    PRINTIT(bg_median[channel]);
00255 //    PRINTIT(bg_IQR[channel]);
00256 //    PRINTIT(A_signal);
00257 //    PRINTIT(C_signal);
00258 //    PRINTIT(G_signal);
00259 //    PRINTIT(T_signal);
00260 
00261     //Verbose::out(4, "signal for channel " + ToStr(channel) + ": "
00262     //   + ToStr(signal[channel]));
00263     //Verbose::out(4, "background for channel " + ToStr(channel) + ": "
00264     //+ ToStr(bg[channel]));
00265 
00266     // what?
00267     signalbackground[channel] = (signal[channel] / bg[channel]);
00268     signalbackgroundFLD[channel] =
00269       ((signal_median[channel] - bg_median[channel]) * (signal_median[channel] - bg_median[channel])) /
00270       (0.5 * ((signal_IQR[channel] * signal_IQR[channel]) + (bg_IQR[channel] * bg_IQR[channel])));
00271   }
00272 
00273   //double A_T_signalratio = A_signal / T_signal;
00274   //double G_C_signalratio = G_signal / C_signal;
00275 
00276 //  std::string AT_B_IQR   = m_Label+"_AT_B_IQR";
00277 //  std::string AT_B_label = m_Label+"_AT_B";
00278 //  std::string AT_FLD     = m_Label+"_AT_FLD";
00279 //  std::string AT_SBR     = m_Label+"_AT_SBR";
00280 //  std::string AT_S_IQR   = m_Label+"_AT_S_IQR";
00281 //  std::string AT_S_label = m_Label+"_AT_S";
00282 //  std::string A_sig_mean = m_Label+"_A_signal_mean";
00283 //  //std::string Asig_Tsig  = m_Label+"_AsignalToTsignal";
00284 //  std::string C_sig_mean = m_Label+"_C_signal_mean";
00285 //  std::string GC_B_IQR   = m_Label+"_GC_B_IQR";
00286 //  std::string GC_B_label = m_Label+"_GC_B";
00287 //  std::string GC_FLD     = m_Label+"_GC_FLD";
00288 //  std::string GC_SBR     = m_Label+"_GC_SBR";
00289 //  std::string GC_S_IQR   = m_Label+"_GC_S_IQR";
00290 //  std::string GC_S_label = m_Label+"_GC_S";
00291 //  std::string G_sig_mean = m_Label+"_G_signal_mean";
00292 //  //std::string Gsig_Csig  = m_Label+"_GsignalToCsignal";
00293 //  std::string T_sig_mean = m_Label+"_T_signal_mean";
00294 //
00295   // what are we looking at?
00296   int chipIx=getNextChipIdx();
00297 
00298   // Populate the Summary Metrics
00299 
00300   // these appear to be the the correct order.
00301   // but the output is swapped around
00302   //setMetric(chipIx , m_Label+"Asig_Tsig      , A_T_signalratio);
00303   //setMetric(chipIx , m_Label+"Gsig_Csig      , G_C_signalratio);
00304   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_AT_B"          , bg[1]);
00305   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_AT_B_IQR"      , bg_IQR[1]);
00306   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_AT_FLD"        , signalbackgroundFLD[1]);
00307   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_AT_S"          , signal[1]);
00308   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_AT_SBR"        , signalbackground[1]);
00309   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_AT_S_IQR"      , signal_IQR[1]);
00310   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_A_signal_mean" , A_signal);
00311   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_C_signal_mean" , C_signal);
00312   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_GC_B"          , bg[0]);
00313   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_GC_B_IQR"      , bg_IQR[0]);
00314   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_GC_FLD"        , signalbackgroundFLD[0]);
00315   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_GC_S"          , signal[0]);
00316   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_GC_SBR"        , signalbackground[0]);
00317   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_GC_S_IQR"      , signal_IQR[0]);
00318   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_G_signal_mean" , G_signal);
00319   setMetric(chipIx   , m_Label+"_T_signal_mean" , T_signal);
00320 
00321   ///@todo option to report other metrics?
00322   setValid(true);
00323 }
